name: Jelly Candy Bubble Run - A cool pop matching puzzle game
name_original: Jelly Candy Bubble Run - A cool pop matching puzzle game
description:
Jelly Candy Bubble Run is fun easy to play matching game. 3 or more to pop. Those jelly candy bubble needs your help to run out the jungle.

- Over 100 FREE levels

- No IAP

- Easy to play

- Get it Now!
